This app has three main functions.
 1. It allows you to calculate your BMI (Body Mass Index)
 2. It allows you to calculate your FFMI (Fat Free Mass Index)
 3. It allows you to calculate your bodyfat percentage with the help of Artificial Intelligence
 


 DISCLAIMER

 The BodyFat calculator is still in it's beta stage. It uses machine learning techniques with
 the help of image recognition algorithms. The results are not entirely accurate, since there is not
 enough training data yet. Τhe findings are a rough approximation, hence take them with a grain of salt.
